Joe Belfiore , corporate vice president of Windows Phone 7, said the core browsing engine that ships on PCs is the same one that ships on Phones. That will help developers, as sites that "work well on the PC will work well on Windows Phone as well," he claimed. Steve Ballmer didn't say if IE9 would be ported

Hopefully, they change it. He's a quarterback, too. He's the same as everybody else. Just because he's maybe a little bit more athletic and faster and can run, he shouldn't be penalized. A story published Saturday said Mitch Daniels would be the odds-on favorite for the GOP nomination in 2012 if pundits, conservative columnists and political thinkers represented the party's base. The diminutive Hoosier has nurtured a profile as a mature politician whose outlook extends beyond the next news cycle and whose demeanor exudes seriousness, the story said. It also noted that the candidate favored by party elites has almost always failed to win the nomination. As for Mike Pence , a story Friday highlighted the effort by a group of conservatives

Kevin Johnson talks about how traffic is increasing at a faster rate than the number of users and how the model will not scale. He notes the need for new business models and an increase in innovation. Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future, said Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer , in a statement. Satya Nadella replaces Microsoft veteran Bob Muglia as head of the highly profitable server business. Steve Ballmer took the unusual step in January of publicly announcing that he thought Muglia

Eric Schmidt acknowledged the company's bright performance, but added that behind the scenes, there may have been leadership struggles. "As our results today show, the outlook is bright," Eric Schmidt wrote. But as Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated. The three-way decision process at Google was never depicted as a cozy session of like-minded individuals all on the same page; apparently the trio decided on a more conventional organization chart. And pursuant to the Dick Cheney 's instructions I gave authorization for them to be taken out. During a recent interview, Simon Cowell has revealed that he will be making an announcement in regard to the show in two weeks. As Digital Spy reports, Simon Cowell said of the new show: We are in the process of going through all the shows. I think there are going to be a few surprises. I genuinely do. I don't think there's one set way of doing it.... I am in conversations with ITV and Fox. Simon Cowell went on to reveal: "We are going to make an announcement soon. We have to make sure all the shows will be back bigger, better, stronger, different. No-one has been contracted yet

conservative pundit says that there's a big opening in the field for someone who can appeal to social conservatives, especially after Mike Pence opted not to run and if Mike Huckabee and Sarah Palin don't jump in. Social conservatives are much of that base, are feeling neglected and are looking for someone like Rick Santorum , George Will writes.
